title: Colin talks with author James Andrew Miller
itunes:title: Colin talks with author James Andrew Miller
description:
Colin talks with Author James Andrew Miller about ESPN dealing with the political views of their hosts and the suspension of Adrian Wojnarowski. They also talk about the pandemic's impact on late night TV and how the hosts are handling it differently. Plus, James talks about his latest 'Origins' podcast diving into the film 'Almost Famous' and the staying power of Cameron Crowe's film 20 years later.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
